Algolia Search API Client for Python
====================================

This is the reference documentation for the **Algolia Search API Client for Python**.
You can always browse the latest version online at `Algolia Community <https://community.algolia.com/algoliasearch-client-python/>`_.

**Note:** This documentation is automatically generated from sources. For an overview of how Algolia works, detailed setup and usage instructions, please refer to our `Documentation <https://www.algolia.com/doc/api-client/python/>`_.
